content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f853 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com forget me not textured baby blanket size approx finished size 20 x 24 30 x 35 materials 2 4 100g hanks forget me not shown in colors 3 light pink and 6 light green needles 24 circular size 10 5 gauge approx 12 sts =4 over pattern cast on 62 sts 90 sts knit 4 row for beginning border begin pattern row 1 rs k2 * k2 p2 repeat from * across to last 4 sts end k2 k2 row 2 ws k2 * p2 k2 repeat from * to last 4 sts end p2 k2 row 3 knit row 4 k2 purl to last 2 sts end k2 work row 1-4 for pattern work in pattern until total length is approx 23 35 ending with a row 2 ending border knit 4 row bind off loosely on next row knitwise weave in all ends 2018 plymouth yarn company 033018jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side
